tokenizeLine

public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Character,CSVNode> tokenizeLine(java.lang.String line)
It's a helper function for tokenizeTheFile function. It gets CSV line and tokenizes it and creates a TreeMap to be inserted into the ArrayList

Parameters:
line - CSV Line
Returns:

intToChar

public java.lang.Character intToChar(int number)
It converts the decimal character to the character itself. This is necessary for handling the columns of the spreadsheet. (e.g. 0 is A and 25 is Z)

Parameters:
number - character decimal value
Returns:
the actual charachter
